pages.title: Kamen Rider Saver
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Gaim Gaiden: Kamen Rider Duke (2015, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver_saver)Sengoku Driver (Saver)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Sengoku Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Blindness$(li)Speed$(li)Haste$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength III
